headline: A Look At Fiserv (FISV) Valuation After New Affirm Partnership On Pay Over Time Debit Options
summary: Fiserv (FISV) stock is back in focus after the company announced an exclusive collaboration with Affirm that brings pay over time options directly into debit card programs for banks and credit unions. See our latest analysis for Fiserv. Those product partnerships with Affirm, Sumitomo Mitsui Card Company and Synchrony have arrived against a mixed backdrop for investors. The share price is at US$67.56 and recent short term gains sit alongside a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 68.3%...

headline: Fiserv, Affirm Team Up to Add Pay-Over-Time to Debit Cards
summary: The partnership lets banks and credit unions offer installment-style payments through debit cards without launching new lending products.
